abstract: Darden Restaurants reports sales were up 2.7 percent in first quarter of 2015 due to menu changes and improved service at its Olive Garden restaurants.
lead_paragraph: Darden Restaurants reported profits that topped Wall Street estimates as menu changes and improved service at its Olive Garden restaurants helped lure more diners.

headline.main: Olive Garden Improvements Help Darden Top Estimates
headline.print_headline: Olive Garden Improvements Help Darden Top Estimates

snippet: Darden Restaurants reported profits that topped Wall Street estimates as menu changes and improved service at its Olive Garden restaurants helped lure more diners.
